basics.name: Omar M. Osman
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Fresh Graduate Electronics Engineering (Computer), Interested in software development.

education.institution: Sudan University of Science and Technology, Khartoum

highlights: Worked closely with the manager to design and implement new features based on functional requirements and specifications
Created custom Angular components for internal framework
Revamped legacy UI components and refactored existing code
Successfully built a reusable Kanban Module using Angular
Worked closely with back-end team to debug and fix ambiguous errors
Provided support to the team lead in mentoring interns and guided them through their projects
Participated in knowledge-sharing sessions to introduce the team to the front-end work and Angular framework specifically
Successfully extended a third-party Python library to be used in one of the company main web services
Worked with the team to complete and ship new features in time for a client with a shorter than normal time-frame
Successfully upgraded a web-portal (Angular) from version 8 to 12
